A woman who hates cats (Alice Krige) and her son (Brian Krause) have moved into a small town, and must deal with a mean cat (Gloom, here stopping for a pose before the fame turned him nasty). The short version: If you’ve seen it, you know and love it. If you haven’t, you really should.
No word on why or how the film got greenlighted, but I hope I get the chance to audition
